SELECT * FROM alley WHERE alley_seq NOT IN ( SELECT c.alley_seq FROM (SELECT b.BO_RAIN,a.* FROM alley a LEFT JOIN booking b ON a.alley_seq = b.ALLEY_SEQ where b.BO_TIME = #{boTime} AND b.BO_DATE = #{boDate} )c

and ALLEY_ADDR1 LIKE concat('%',#{alleyAddr1},'%')
AND #{boTime} >= OPEN_TIME AND #{boTime} <= CLOSE_TIME
order by alley_seq desc limit #{skip},#{amount}
